column4: Latest;Siem Reap:------ At 9:30 am on March 28
column6: the police force of the provincial immigration office cooperated with the police force of the intervention office and the police force of Svay Dangkum and Deputy Prosecutor of the Siem Reap Provincial Court Prosecution Court to raid premises in Svay Dangkum District
column7: Siem Reap Province.------The case involved illegal online activity using VOIP.------In the operation
column9: including 40 women and about 150 computers  were taken away.. The police force is now proceeding to send suspects to the Siem Reap police commission for questioning.
